briefdescription.para: Primary font used in the GUI.
Logger for this class.
Service used to load products from the backend.
Service used to calculate bill totals and generate receipt files.
Table models for the three product categories.
Last calculated bill (after pressing Pay).
Panel that groups all appetizer items and controls.
Panel that groups all drink items and controls.
Panel that groups all main course items and controls.
Table for appetizers items.
Scroll pane for appetizers table.
Table for drinks items.
Scroll pane for drinks table.
Button to go back to the Login window.
Title label "BLACK PLATE MENU".
Logo / screenshot label on the top left.
Panel that shows subtotal, VAT, total and receipt number.
Main container panel of the Order window.
Table for main course items.
Scroll pane for main course table.
Button to start a new receipt.
Button to calculate and confirm payment.
Label that shows the current receipt number.
Button to save the current receipt to a file.
Label that displays the subtotal amount.
Label that displays the total amount.
Label that displays the VAT amount.
Subtotal of the order (sum of all line prices).
VAT amount (15% of the subtotal).
Total amount (subtotal + VAT).
Current receipt number (used when saving receipt files).
Writer used to generate the text file for the receipt (kept for compatibility).
Constructor.

para.verbatim: Creates the order menu window, initializes all Swing components, configures the table models and loads the menu from the backend.

briefdescription.para: Package-private constructor used by tests to inject a fake ProductService and optionally skip the asynchronous loading of the menu.

parameterdescription.para: ProductService instance to use (may be a stub in tests)
whether to invoke loadMenuFromDatabase() (tests may pass false)

briefdescription.para: Package-private convenience constructor for tests that inject a ProductService and perform the normal menu loading.
Placeholder method for loading prices from an external source.

para.verbatim: Currently not used directly, as menu items are loaded in loadMenuFromDatabase(). Kept for compatibility.

briefdescription.para: Configures the three tables (Drinks, Appetizers, Main Course).

para.verbatim: Each table has four columns: - ID (not editable) - Item (not editable) - Price (not editable) - Qty (editable, quantity selected by the cashier)

briefdescription.para: Loads menu data (drinks, appetizers, main courses) from the backend in a background thread.
Fills the drinks table model with data from the backend.

parameterdescription.para: [java.util.List<Drink>] List of drinks retrieved from the backend.

briefdescription.para: Fills the appetizers table model with data from the backend.

parameterdescription.para: [java.util.List<Appetizer>] List of appetizers retrieved from the backend.

briefdescription.para: Fills the main courses table model with data from the backend.

parameterdescription.para: [java.util.List<MainCourse>] List of main courses retrieved from the backend.

briefdescription.para: Sums the total price for a given table model.

para.verbatim: For each row: - reads Price (column 2) and Qty (column 3), - if Qty > 0, accumulates (Qty * Price).

simplesect.para: [double] Sum of the line totals in that model.

briefdescription.para: Sets the Qty column of the given model to 0 in all rows.
Initializes GUI components.

para.verbatim: Generated by the Form Editor: do not modify manually. Creates and arranges the panels for Drinks, Appetizers, Main courses and the Receipt summary, as well as all labels, tables and buttons.

briefdescription.para: Calculates subtotal, VAT and total and shows a confirmation dialog.

para.verbatim: Steps: - Sums all line prices from the three tables. - Uses OrderService to compute BillResult (subtotal, VAT, total). - Updates the labels in the Receipt panel. - If no items were selected (sum == 0), shows an information dialog. - Otherwise, shows a "Paid successfully" dialog.

parameterdescription.para: [java.awt.event.ActionEvent] Event triggered by clicking the "Pay" button.

briefdescription.para: Saves the current bill information to a text file through OrderService.

detaileddescription.para:
The file is created under the "receipts" directory with the name:
"billNo.<receiptNo>.txt"
If there is no calculated bill (lastBill == null or total == 0), an information dialog is shown and no file is created.

parameterdescription.para: [java.awt.event.ActionEvent] Event triggered by clicking the "Save Receipt" button.

briefdescription.para: Starts a new receipt and resets the form to its initial state.

para.verbatim: Only works when the current total is not zero. If so, it: - resets Qty column to 0 in all tables, - resets subtotal, VAT and total labels, - clears internal subtotal, VAT and total variables, - clears lastBill, - increments the receipt number and updates its label.

parameterdescription.para: [java.awt.event.ActionEvent] Event triggered by clicking the "New Receipt" button.

briefdescription.para: Returns to the Login window.

para.verbatim: Closes the current Order window and opens a new instance of the Login form.

parameterdescription.para: [java.awt.event.ActionEvent] Event triggered by clicking the "Go Back" button.

briefdescription.para: Standalone entry point for testing the Order window.

para.verbatim: Sets the Nimbus look and feel if available and displays a new instance of Order. In the normal application flow, this window is opened after a successful login.

briefdescription.para: Main menu window for taking customer orders.

para.verbatim:
Swing window that allows the cashier to: - select quantities of drinks, appetizers and main courses. - see the items and prices loaded dynamically from the database. - calculate subtotal, VAT and total. - save a simple text receipt to disk.
All menu items and prices are now loaded from the backend using ProductService (instead of being hardcoded).
